title: Wanderlist
desc: Location based music app that finds local artists near you.

title: Trading Card Autolister
desc: This unique app is built on the NodeJs framework and uses Inquirer.js to prompt the user for basic info. Axios calls Scryfall api to return live prices for cards, image, set and title data. Then after each card is inputed it outputs a csv file that ebay can read through its bulk listing reader.

title: FamilyMarketing.Us
desc: U.S. Family Marketing offers custom websites, branding, and marketing solutions available anytime. When presented with a challenge we strive for excellence and overachieve.

title: ExpungedIt.Com
desc: Utilizes SurveyJS to create a survey experience for people who need their prior convictions expunged by professional lawyers.

title: Offline Budget Tracker
desc: Using smart caching and service workers, you can track a budget offline from anywhere. Download the webpage as an app to your phone and use it.

title: Employee Directory
desc: Gathers a list of random employees from a random user API. Sorts and returns a table.
